abstract: Commercial real estate market in New York City is still a renters' market, even as office rents have risen since the recession; landlords are offering months of free rent and making building improvements to entice tenants.
snippet: Although Manhattan office rents have risen since the recession, landlords are offering months of free rent and making building improvements to entice tenants.
lead_paragraph: Although Manhattan office rents have risen since the recession, landlords are offering months of free rent and making building improvements to entice tenants.

headline.main: It’s Still a Renter’s Market, Office Landlords Learn
headline.print_headline: It’s Still a Renter’s Market, Office Landlords Learn
headline.seo: It’s Still a Renter’s Market, Office Landlords Learn
